title: News24.com | China pauses in memory of virus victims and 'martyrs'
description: China came to a standstill on Saturday to mourn patients and medical staff killed by the coronavirus, as the world's most populous country observed a nationwide three-minute silence.
content:
China came to a standstill on Saturday to mourn patients and medical staff killed by the coronavirus, as the world's most populous country observed a nationwide three-minute silence.
At 10am, citizens paused, cars, trains and ships sounded their horns, and a… [+4129 chars]
